ja537:4.2: Yathā tuvaṃ → yameva tvaṃ (bj) | asi → ca'si (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja537:34.2: Na jīvitaṃ → na hi jīvitaṃ (bj) | dhammo → dhammaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja537:34.3: tāyati → tāyate (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ja537:45.2: nahimā → na imā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); nayimā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja537:46.4: Sahassiyā nāma kā atthi → sahassiyo nāma idhatthi (bj); sahassiyo nāma kuthatthi (pts-vp-pli1)
ja537:47.2: Santoti maṃ → santo ca maṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr); santo mamaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja537:49.2: Gāthaṃ ahaṃ atthavatiṃ → gāthā ahaṃ atthavatī (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja537:50.3: paribhāsasi maṃ → bhāsase maṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); paribhāsase maṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
ja537:50.4: porisādassa ñatte → porisādassa kante (bj, pts-vp-pli1); porisādassa ñante (sya1ed, sya2ed); porisādassupante (mr)
ja537:69.1: katā me kārā → katūpakāro (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja537:80.1: bujjhasi tuvaṃ → bujjhasi tvaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); bujjhase tuvaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja537:88.3: Sake te raṭṭhe paṭipādayāmi → sakena raṭṭhena paṭipādayāmi te (bj)
ja537:92.3: Namhi sakkā → namhi sakko (bj, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja537:90.4: Aññaṃ → aññaṃ tuvaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | samma varassu → samma varaṃ varassu (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); samma varaṃ varassūti (pts-vp-pli1)
ja537:93.3: pitvā visamissapānaṃ → pītvana visassa thālaṃ (bj); pitvā visamissathālaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); pītvāna visassathālaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
ja537:95.2: Manāpiye → manāpike (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | kāmaguṇe ca → kāmaguṇepi (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja537:29.2: dhanaṃ → dhanaṃ caje (bj) | aṅgavarassa hetu → yo pana aṅgahetu (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja537:107.3: Evameva vo → evampi vo (sya1ed, sya2ed); evameva no (pts-vp-pli1)
ja537:107.4: yatheva → tatheva (pts-vp-pli1) | puttā → puttā na te (mr)
ja537:111.2: Subhamhi → sucimhi (bj, pts-vp-pli1) | saṅge → saññate (bj, pts-vp-pli1); laṅkate (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja537:111.3: Seyyassa → sayanassa (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ja537:119.3: Evampi ve → evampi me (sya1ed, sya2ed); evampi ce (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ja537:121.1: Na so rājā yo → rājā na so yo (mr)
